item.title: Port foward
item.dc:creator: @darkandlightjak5 darkandlightjak5
item.description:
@darkandlightjak5 wrote:

Well I don’t like using portforward.com, I go right into the router.
Type your default gateway in the address bar, and type in the username and password. Then go down to an option that says something as Port forwarding, or something along the lines of that, sometimes it’s games. Then it will say something like add custom service. Click that button, and it will say something along the lines of, Service name. For that put your server name, but don’t put the no-ip.info, just put lalalalalscape if that’s your name of the server. Then fill in the ports, and whatever else there is, and your done!

Read full topic
